column5: sorry for all the non fishing related pics but I hit up Seymour again today for some more pics.  Weather wasn't the greatest and basically the whole hike was through clouds so the pics of the distant mountains I was hoping for weren't even a possibility.  Anyways I was practicing with panoramic pics and also got a pic of a grouse.....enjoy..  oh and the topic is titled "say whaaaat" because thats the vibe this grouse was giving me    this pic is really 5 stiched together using a panoramic photo program....im very impressed with how it turned out   this pic is 6 images stitched together.....and again i had no idea they would turn out this good   well that should be the last of my taking up board space for non fishing material for now because the weekend is over....who knows what next weekend will bring....enjoy the photos
Great shots Brandon. Fishing or non-fishing, keep posting those great pics!
I'm also enjoying the pics ... very nice indeed.
that bird shot is really cool..  ..those pics of the trees & mountains could be a post-card for sure,great shots bud...cheers
thanks for the kind words everybody
once again Brandon nice pics, and no need to aplogize, just keep posting pics like that   likely the only way i'll get to see anything like it.  Maureen
Very cool bud.You sure are good with that picture take,n thingy.LOL  TFS
Brandon like Roy said, you keep taking those pics and we will look.  Well done!  Whopper
those are some great shots, especially that one of the grouse.
